channel.title: About the Onboarding category
channel.description:
The Start Here category is meant as a starting point for newbies to OGM. It's a beginning, but can be improved a lot.
How might we best onboard people so they aren't disoriented by the (intentional) chaos, and so they find their way quickly to where their passions and superpowers are best used?

item.title: About the Onboarding category
item.dc:creator: Jerry
